name: Simon
room_type: Two-Bedroom Villa with Private Pool and Garden
text: This hotel is incredible, the design, facilities, gardens, pools, tranquility, shuttle-bus & best of all has to be the staff. Incredibly unusual to have a hotel where ALL the staff have been amazing. In particular 3 staff went beyond this amazing level of service and truly made our holiday incredible. Attentiveness without being intrusive, charming without being smarmy, kind and warm-hearted with a degree of style which was professional as it was beautiful!

name: Youness
text: amazing honey moon stay, staff very attentive and welcoming Lamia in the reception was exceptional and very helpful we got a nice luxury villa , very clean , and peaceful. food was great

name: Nayeema
text: My experience at Tignmiza was exceptional, I would love to visit Marrakech again just to stay in this stunning hotel. the staff were really friendly and room service was amazing. I could go on and on about how amazing the stay was and my only regret is not staying for longer! The entire vibe of the hotel was calm and i would love to stay again.

name: Michael
text: Very friendly service, happy to go the extra mile. The hotel is beautiful and would definitely recommend.

name: Stephanie
text: We loved that it was a short journey about a 10-15 minute drive from the medina, it was calm and relaxing and felt like absolute luxury. We loved that we could go from the hustle and bustle of the city to this relaxing absolutely stunning hotel where the staff cater for you’re every need. The decor in the hotel is a spectacle worth the fee alone.

name: Monia
room_type: One-Bedroom Villa with Private Pool and Garden
text: Honestly, I could not fault this property at all. The pools, the ambience, the food, the staff and the rooms are all amazing!

name: Arnaud
text: Amazing place with beautiful gardens and pools

name: El
room_type: Two-Bedroom Villa with Private Pool and Garden
text: The property is very clean and lovely deference of fruit trees

name: Toluwaloju
room_type: One-Bedroom Villa with Private Pool and Garden
text: The villa/room was divine! So much space and lovely views. Cinema in the hotel is such a nice touch.
